description: Triggered when an active subscription billing dates are changed.

active.description: Indicates if the subscription is currently used for allowing access to premium entitlements.

billingPlatform.description: Represents the payment processor for each subscription.

country.description: Available for subscription billed through the Google/Android billing platform.  Indicates the subscription's country of origin.

currentPeriodEnd.description: The end of the new billing period.

currentPeriodStart.description: The start of the new billing period.

daysUntilRenew.description: The number of days until renewal, e.g. 15, 30, 60

entitlement.description: Indicates the premium product access this subscription promotes.

planId.description: The premium product that purchased and billed each interval.

platform.description: Similar to billingPlatform.  This represents where the subscription originated.

promotionId.description: The ID of the associated promotional campaign.

subscriptionId.description: The unique identifier for each subscription that can be used for SQL joins for determining lifecycle events.
